description:
This course if designed for the Amazon seller that has realized that Amazon is a very competitive market place and is tired of constantly fighting the "race to the bottom"

In this course, I focus more on the thought processes and selling strategies for creating bundling products. This is not a course that's main purpose is to just show you how to create a bundle listing.

All the training is screen capture video. It is like we are sitting together and I am going over the different though processes and strategies that I believe work best for bundling products for Amazon.

By the time you finish this course, you should know what it takes to create bundles that will sell and that you can basically "own" the buy box on.
title: Creating Bundles For Amazon FBA
instructors: Full Time FBA Seller Jason Wilkey
